summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2674, for the improvement of the alley in block 49, Mt. Baker Park Addition, bounded by Hanford Street on the south, by Cascadia Avenue on the east, by Ferris Place on the north and by Mt. Rainier Drive on the west, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and paving the same with asphalt or similar material, under Ordinance No. 31533 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
